Virtual Whisk - A virtual reality app that allows users to experience the world of baking from the comfort of their own homes. Users can select a recipe, choose their ingredients, and watch as their virtual whisk mixes and bakes their creations in real-time. Confidence score: 0.8

Smart Whisk - A smartphone app that uses AI to help users measure ingredients with precision. The app can recognize and automatically measure the volume of ingredients, eliminating the need for physical measuring cups. Confidence score: 0.9

Whisk-O-Matic - A smart kitchen appliance that combines a whisk with a slow cooker, allowing users to whisk and cook their ingredients simultaneously. The appliance can also be controlled through a smartphone app, allowing for easy use and monitoring. Confidence score: 0.8

Whisk-A-Tron - A robotic whisk that can assist users in measuring and mixing ingredients with precision. The robotic arm can move around the kitchen to reach different ingredients and can also be controlled through a smartphone app. Confidence score: 0.9

Whisk-Ease - A whisk with a built-in scale that can measure ingredients with precision. The whisk also has a built-in timer, allowing users to easily track the time it takes to mix and bake their ingredients. Confidence score: 0.8
